# Ignore Backup and Autosave Files
*.PrjPCBStructure
*.Backup*
*.Autosave*
*.~*
*.tmp

# Ignore Output and Generated Files
*.OutJob
*.SchDoc.GraphicSettings
*.net
*.cmp
*.txt
*.int
*.html
*.csv
*.pdf
*.zip
*.xls*
*.doc*
*.log
*.gbr
*.gerber
*.rep
*.ipc_d*

# Ignore Simulation and Analysis Files
*.simdata
*.dsn
*.expt
*.emf
*.HypRpt

# Ignore Compiled Files
*.cproj
*.elf
*.hex
*.bin
*.obj
*.asm
*.map
*.lst

# Ignore Library and Configuration Files
*.db
*.ini
*.ldb
*.cfg
*.prjpcbstate
.history/

# Ignore Folder-Specific Metadata
__Previews/
__Snapshots/
.PCBDoc.versions/
